name: Modjo
description: '''Modjo''' was a [[French house]] music duo formed in [[Paris]] in 1999 by producer Romain Tranchart (born 9 June 1976) and singer Yann Destagnol (born 14 July 1978). They are best known for their biggest hit, "[[Lady (Hear Me Tonight)]]", released in 2000, along with other successful singles such as "[[Chillin' (Modjo song)|Chillin']]" and "[[No More Tears (Modjo song)|No More Tears]]", both released in 2001.
